snippet.title: Let's Create! Pottery - Official trailer
snippet.description:
Finish all quests, build your own palette of colors and brushes and let your creativity flow freely. Then bigger challenges are waiting for you on the LCP Portal (www.potterygame.com) where you can post your first pot and join the amazing community of potters. Climb in the rankings, compete with talented LCP artist and print 3D your own creations to surprise your friends or decorate the house!

Download Now:

App Store: http://bit.ly/lgi7cQ
Google Play: http://bit.ly/lrMfQe
Mac App Store: http://bit.ly/mezMfi
